channel.title: What?
channel.description: Well, there I was making headless arrows for fletching. After making a few hundred I got level 10, and the "You just advanced a fletching level" chat box interface opened up as usual, I clicked "Click here to continue", and was surprised to see this.. never seen it before.. [img]http://i.imgur.com/Mq61nX0.png[/img]

item.title: What?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

RSCShadow:

Yeah the flashing icons wasn’t too long after this. When you clicked them, they’d show you what you’ve unlocked in a nice list. A lot more convenient than showing you just a few things in the chatbox, especially since I usually click away by mistake.

I thought they were around this time

Read full topic

item.title: What?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“imthenull, post:8, topic:506647”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=624883.msg4255184#msg4255184 date=1362610794]
I seem to remember that they had the flashing skill icons upon level and when you clicked on it it came up with all the new things you could do with it. Or was this at a later date? My memory’s a little hazy
[/quote]EoC noob[/quote]EoC my ass, I haven’t played since like 09 I’ll have you know mr nothing but rizon

Read full topic

item.title: What?
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I had the same thing happen to me, whats the big deal? It is just informing you that you now have one of the many requirements for that quest.
